snippet: Two makers of wearable cameras, GoPro and Contour, demonstrate products that connect the cameras to Wi-Fi networks for live broadcasting.
abstract: Two makers of wearable cameras, GoPro and Contour, demonstrate products that connect the cameras to Wi-Fi networks for live broadcasting.
lead_paragraph: LAS VEGAS -- At the International Consumer Electronics Show, the helmet camera makers GoPro and Contour have both demonstrated products that can put all of your plummeting, hurtling and rocketing adventures on the air live through a Wi-Fi connection.
